name: WKAlertActionStyle
desc: Constants indicating the style of the action button.

items.name: case `default`
items.desc: The default style. Use this for most of your buttons.

items.name: case cancel
items.desc: A cancel action. Use this style for an action that cancels the operation without making changes.

items.name: case destructive
items.desc: An action that causes destructive behavior to the userâ€™s data or the app. Destructive actions are styled in a way that warns the user of the destructive nature of the action.
